import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as data from '../../../../shared/data/dashboard/online-course' @Component({ selector: 'app-hello-name', templateUrl: './hello-name.component.html', styleUrls: ['./hello-name.component.scss'] }) export class HelloNameComponent { public completed = data.completed public progress = data.progress }
